definitions.definition: half the distance between two places:
examples: Leeds is midway between London and Edinburgh.

definitions.definition: in the middle of a process or period of time:
examples: She stopped working midway through her pregnancy.

definitions.definition: a part of a fair, circus, etc. where there are games of skill and other types of entertainment:
examples: Some people go to the state fair to see the livestock, but teenagers like the midway.
